content.title: Life Path: Dharma Focus
content.summary: In your life design, Dharma (duty and purpose) is strongly emphasized.
content.analysis: You are oriented toward principled contribution and long-horizon responsibility.
content.implication: Decision quality improves when actions are anchored to mission and service.

content.title: Life Path: Artha Focus
content.summary: Material structure, achievement, and practical ambition are central themes.
content.analysis: Execution is strongest when measurable objectives and systems are explicit.
content.implication: Resource strategy and disciplined sequencing accelerate progress.

content.title: Life Path: Kama Focus
content.summary: Relational fulfillment, creativity, and emotional richness shape major decisions.
content.analysis: Aesthetic and relational motivations contribute materially to life direction.
content.implication: Outcomes are strongest when desire is balanced with clear boundaries.

content.title: Career Drive Anchored in Artha
content.summary: Material strategy and structural advancement are core drivers of your professional path.
content.analysis: Your strongest performance appears when ownership, leverage points, and success metrics are explicit.
content.implication: Treat career growth as designed architecture: sequence milestones, protect focus, and compound credibility.
content.examples: Ambiguity-heavy roles can still work if translated into measurable execution contracts.

content.title: Reinforced Career Narrative
content.summary: Career outcomes are strongly shaped by the interaction between strategic ambition and karmic correction loops.
content.analysis: When execution discipline aligns with lesson-integration, volatility decreases and compounding improves.
content.implication: Treat each setback as structured calibration to preserve long-cycle momentum.
content.examples: A repeated obstacle often resolves once the same decision-pattern is intentionally redesigned.
